short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate Zendesk, Clockify and Hurricane Labs APIs for easier time tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hurricane Labs users can more easily control Clockify ticket timers on Zendesk tickets and Opsgenie alerts with this extension.  Links are created in Zendesk ticket and Opsgenie alert pages to start timers and pre-fill timer fields according to Hurricane Labs specifications.
